hero.name: Michael Chen
hero.title: Senior Business Consultant
hero.summary: 20+ years of experience in strategic planning and business transformation. Specialized in helping Fortune 500 companies achieve sustainable growth.

services.title: Strategic Planning
services.description: Develop comprehensive business strategies aligned with your company's vision and market opportunities.

services.title: Business Transformation
services.description: Guide organizations through digital transformation and operational excellence initiatives.

services.title: Executive Coaching
services.description: One-on-one coaching for C-level executives to enhance leadership effectiveness.

testimonials.quote: Michael's strategic insights transformed our business operations and increased our revenue by 35%.
testimonials.author: Jennifer Smith

testimonials.quote: Working with Michael was a game-changer. His expertise in business transformation is unmatched.
testimonials.author: Robert Johnson
